zh.title: 西班牙国王胡安·卡洛斯一世登基
迈克·泰森成为最年轻重量级拳王
撒切尔夫人辞去英国首相职务
迪士尼动画电影《玩具总动员》上映
安格拉·默克尔就任德国总理
柬埔寨金边踩踏事件致数百人死亡
国际空间站接收新型电池升级系统
卡塔尔世界杯正式开幕

en.title: Juan Carlos became King of Spain.
Mike Tyson became youngest heavyweight boxing champion.
Margaret Thatcher resigned as Prime Minister of the UK.
Disney/Pixar's "Toy Story" released in US theaters.
Angela Merkel became Germany's first female Chancellor.
North Korea shelled Yeonpyeong Island, escalating tensions.
International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) published report on global energy transition.
FIFA World Cup began in Qatar.
